work_experience.title: Revive Our Gulf
work_experience.description: Built and integrated an underwater camera system to monitor and track the position of the insaive seaweed species Caulerpa.

work_experience.title: Maui63
work_experience.description: Helped develop the platform and software for a Jetson Orin Computer Vision system to detect and track airborne obstacles for a drone.

work_experience.title: Hydracel
work_experience.description: Designed and prototyped a Cool Thermal Energy Storage (CTES) system using water's latent heat for solar energy storage

university_projects.title: A Convolutional Neural Network That Extracts Depth from Images
university_projects.description: University Honours Research Project that explored the use of a bio-inspired Convolutional Neural Network to extract depth from images. The project was completed in 2023 and was supervised by Luke Hallum

university_projects.title: Anthropromorphic Soft Robotics Hand
university_projects.description: University Biomechtronics Project that explored the design and development of a print in place robotics fingers.
